existing_features.title: Update the frontend DailyTasksSection component to automatically refresh and display newly generated tasks when they become available at midnight

new_feature_requests.summary: AI should automatically generate and assign tasks daily at 00:00:00
Implement a backend timer system that triggers at 00:00:00 UTC daily to automatically generate AI tasks for all users
Ensure the daily task generation system handles timezone-independent execution and persists tasks immediately upon generation
